definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
Ministry of Railways (MOR), disbanded in 2013 with its regulatory functions taken over by the Ministry of Transport 交通運輸部|交通运输部[Jiao1 tong1 Yun4 shu1 bu4]

sentences.english: A fault in the wheel flat of a railroad car would threaten the safety of the car.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道車輛踏面平輪故障危及列車行車安全。

sentences.english: The Railway Ministry has also ordered a two-month safety review of railway operations.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部長也已經下令將開展爲期兩個月的安全檢查。

sentences.english: I commend the indian railways for thier strong and positive stand.
sentences.chinese: 我很贊同印度鐵道部這種堅定的立場。

sentences.english: It told the news agency Xinhua the ministry still enjoys strong government support.
sentences.chinese: 大公對新華社說，鐵道部依然享有政府的強有力支持。

sentences.english: China's railway minister, Sheng Guangzu, was reported to have rushed to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，中國鐵道部部長盛光祖已經火速趕往現場。

sentences.english: Online demands abound that the railway minister, Sheng Guangzu, lose his job too.
sentences.chinese: 網絡熱呼鐵道部長盛光祖引咎辭職。

sentences.english: Numerical simulation technology is used to do simulation research on finite deformation crashworthiness of railway passenger car.
sentences.chinese: 利用數值仿真技術對鐵道客車進行大變形碰撞研究。

sentences.english: Up ahead appeared something like a sluice gate, straddling the tracks.
sentences.chinese: 前方出現了一個大水閘似的建築，攔腰橫跨在鐵道上。

sentences.english: Passenger cars and KATO DL of Taipingshan logging railway, 1968.
sentences.chinese: 太平山森林鐵道的客車與加藤製柴油機車。

sentences.english: Mr. Ghulam Muhammad Bilor Pakistani Railways Minister, should be sent to China for some times only.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦鐵道部長應當去中國待一段時間。

sentences.english: The"Regulations of Shanghai Municipality on Administration of Underground Railway"shall be repealed at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 《上海市地下鐵道管理條例》同時廢止。

sentences.english: Axle is one of the important parts of railway vehicles dealing transportation safety.
sentences.chinese: 車軸是直接關係鐵道車輛運營安全的重要部件之一。

sentences.english: They have railed the meadows off from the new railway cutting.
sentences.chinese: 他們已用欄杆把草地和新鐵道的路塹隔離開來。

sentences.english: This Chapter does not cover railway or tramway rolling-stock designed solely for running on rails.
sentences.chinese: 本章不包括僅可在鋼軌上運行的鐵道及電車道車輛。

sentences.english: Pai-Ling Rope way, Taipingshan Logging Railway System, 1968.
sentences.chinese: 太平山森林鐵道系統中的白嶺索道著點。

sentences.english: Railways ministry spokesman dismissed from office.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部發言人王勇平離任。

definition: Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
